text: Sudar Provision is a small convenience store which is located at Geylang vicinity. It provides groceries as well daily needs. Pricing was reasonable. Payment could be made by cash and electronic modes.  It is located within walking distance from some budget hotels at Geylang so tourists may get their necessities here as well.

Drinks in Singapore are expensive, but here they are about the same as in Japan.
Water starts from 0.6SGD
